hibernate-mapping.query: select count(sec) from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec where sec.eid=:eid
from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec where sec.eid=:eid
from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec where sec.courseOffering=:courseOffering
select section.eid, mbr.role from SectionUdlCmImpl as section, MembershipUdlCmImpl as mbr where mbr.userId=:userEid and mbr.memberContainer=section

select section.eid, mbr.role from SectionUdlCmImpl as section, MembershipCmImpl as mbr where mbr.userId=:userEid and mbr.memberContainer=section and section.courseOffering.academicSession.eid=:academicSessionEid
select sec from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec, EnrollmentSetUdlCmImpl as es where :userId in elements(es.officialInstructors) and sec.enrollmentSet = es

select sec from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec, EnrollmentSetUdlCmImpl as es where :userId in elements(es.officialInstructors) and sec.enrollmentSet = es and sec.courseOffering.academicSession.eid=:academicSessionEid
select sec from SectionUdlCmImpl as sec, EnrollmentUdlCmImpl as enr where enr.userId = :userId and sec.enrollmentSet = enr.enrollmentSet and enr.dropped=false
